items.title: hammer
items.longDescription: The hammer has a wooden handle and looks well used

items.title: bottle
items.longDescription: The label says 'Nitroglycerine'. Better be careful!

items.title: window
items.longDescription: The window is closed and the curtains are drawn.

items.title: safe
items.longDescription: The safe is closed and locked.

items.title: man
items.longDescription: The man looks old and tired. He looks at you with a curious expression.
phrases: If you're looking for the ferry, it won't be here for another hour!
Tickets are two dollars for one way
You could try swimming, if you're not afraid of them big fishes...

items.title: Eli
items.longDescription: Eli is a stout man in his 40s. He looks at you with a true salesman's false eye.
phrases: Hello there, partner! Eli is the name.
What can I get you, son?
I have some fresh chewing gum right here! Only one dollar!
Well, how about some nails. 5 bucks a box.
Here is a real bargain: This fine jewel once belonged to the Emperor Napoleon himself! I swear! 50 dollars!

items.title: jewel
items.longDescription: The jewel glows in the sun

items.title: nails
items.longDescription: The box looks opened and feels half full

items.title: ferry
items.longDescription: The ferry S/S Dandelion is crowded with people getting on and off. It is quite worn down and could use some repairs.

items.title: ticket
items.longDescription: The ticket says: 'S/S Dandelion Certificate of Entry. Valid for one way journey across River Shanty. Price: $2'

locations.title: Main Street
locations.description:
Overlooking Main Street, Flatville. It's a hazy morning. Church bells are heard from afar.
Behind you is the Central Bank building.

locations.title: The park
locations.description:
You are in a park. Birds are singing and doing whatever birds do.
A small bottle lies in the grass.

locations.title: Bank manager's office
locations.description: You are in the bank manager's office. The manager is away.

locations.title: River bank
locations.description: You are at the banks of River Shanty, at the ferry pier.

locations.title: Ferry pier
locations.description: You are on the ferry pier. An old man is sitting on a bench.

locations.title: River Shanty
locations.description: You are in the river. You are caught up in a strong swirl.

locations.title: River bottom
locations.description: You are at the bottom of the river.

locations.title: Outside Eli's Store
locations.description: You are in Main Street, outside Eli's Store

locations.title: Eli's Store
locations.description: You are in Eli's Store. Eli stands behind the counter.

locations.title: Dandelion Stern
locations.description: You are in the stern of S/S Dandelion. It is quite crowded with passengers.

locations.title: Dandelion Bow
locations.description: You are in the bow of S/S Dandelion. It is even more crowded with passengers.

locations.title: Deerwood Ferry Terminal
locations.description: You are in Deerwood Ferry Terminal, gate 14
